sentences.en: A touch of lychee is also present.
Consumers were hooked on the natural ingredients and exotic scents like ginger, yuzu, lychee, and ylang-ylang.
sentences.cn: 消费者喜欢的是自然成分和有异国风味的香气，像生姜、柚子、荔枝、依兰（菲律宾 马来西亚产的依兰树，所产的依兰油用于做香水）。

sentences.en: Dennis: Oh, I seldom eat lychee and longan.
sentences.cn: 丹尼斯: 喔, 我很少吃荔枝和龙眼.

sentences.en: Fruit: mango, lychee star fruit . cherry, etc.
sentences.cn: 水果: 芒果, 荔枝,杨桃,樱桃.

sentences.en: It has a juicy, translucent flesh with a similar taste to a lychee.
sentences.cn: 果肉透明富含汁液, 吃起来像荔枝.

sentences.en: It opens with Fruity Notes of lychee melon, sparkling mandarin, white cherry and passion fruit.
sentences.cn: 它以荔枝瓜, 桔子, 白色樱桃和西番莲子的水果开始.

sentences.en: Longan and the most suitable costumes fresh, lychee and other products.
sentences.cn: 最适合盛装鲜桂圆, 荔枝等产品.

sentences.en: Lychee is a tropical fruit from southeast China.
sentences.cn: 荔枝是一种源自中国东南部的一种热带水果.

sentences.en: Lychee seed extract stimulates collagen production.
sentences.cn: 荔枝籽精华促进胶原质产生.

sentences.en: Only a decade ago, the place was exurban rice paddies and lychee orchards.
sentences.cn: 十年前，这个地方只是一个城市的远郊，种植水稻和荔枝。

sentences.en: Rambutan is an odd fruit that looks like a furry strawberry from the outside, and much like a lychee on the inside.
sentences.cn: 红毛丹是一种很有趣的水果，外表长的像长满毛的草莓，而果肉又和荔枝相似。

sentences.en: Supply different fresh preserved fruits like Citrus Fruit, Pomelo, Mango, Pineapple, Lychee, Longan etc.
sentences.cn: 供应不同的新鲜水果,如柑橘类水果, 柚子, 龙眼, 荔枝, 芒果, 菠萝等.

sentences.en: The determination of anthocyanin and its degradation index ( DI ) in lychee are studied.
sentences.cn: 本文研究了荔枝果皮总花色 苷 及其降解指数的含量测定.

sentences.en: This evening, my mother bought a bag of lychees back, I picked an observation with lychee.
sentences.cn: 今天晚上, 妈妈买了一袋荔枝回来, 我拿起一把荔枝观察起来.

trans.tran_en: a small round fruit with a rough pink-brown shell outside and sweet white flesh inside
